title: Haven't played for three weeks because I've been on a holiday. Can anyone fill me in?
body: Who's now really strong (especially mid) and who's now really week? (Again, mid). Has anyone become newly op? Any new must bans? Items? What AP items now suck and which ones are good? And which AP items are must builds on who?

replies.body: Gromp became a champ, that's the only thing you need to know.
Lmao oh yeah is he any good?

Runeglave ezreal is the new midlane meta, (smite ez)
The AP item changes were fairly recent so everyone is still figuring that out.
Tank meta still as strong as it is so ban senjuani any chance you get

But, is Runeglaive Ez ACTUALLY good? What's the general build/skill order?

How's my Ahri main in this meta?

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LzyOAj1J,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-13T07:53:56.220+0000)

> Runeglave ezreal is the new midlane meta, (smite ez)
> The AP item changes were fairly recent so everyone is still figuring that out.
> Tank meta still as strong as it is so ban senjuani any chance you get

you mean pick an afk jgler and farm for 20 mins

be 4 levels ahead of everyone and 1v5 teams?
Not really, you get stacks from kills... I think devourer was more stationed at the afk jungle meta before sated was released
While u were gone, Zilean Top has become new LCS thing.
